short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Subkit plugin that adds furigana to Japanese subtitles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a companion plugin for the Subkit extension.  DO NOT install unless Subkit is installed first. 

Subkit: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/subkit/nbfimkdbifhjfambljjggekodjlppiad

You'll then need to connect Subkit to your video and enable furigana from there.  See this guide for tips.  https://subkit.net/docs/guides/furigana

Once installed and enabled, you can see furigana added to Japanese subtitles on popular streaming platforms like Netflix, YouTube, Amazon Prime, and Disney+.
